attributes.action: Give immediate notice to leave the European Union (EU).
attributes.additional_details: It is stated thus in Article 50. And therefore we do not need to have 2 years  of negotiations which may not lead to an outcome anyway.
attributes.background: We have been lied to about the requirements of leaving the European Union. Under international law and under Article 50 (1) itself, only notice to leave is necessary. We do not need to trigger Article 50 at all.
